snippet.title: Throw Bro - Our Game Boy style Indie Platformer!
snippet.description:
Wishlist Throw Bro on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2994950/Throw_Bro/

This is the trailer for our game Throw Bro releasing on steam on October 25th! Throw Bro is our modern take on retro gameboy style games of old! A mixture of modern platforming mechanics with classic Kirby and Mario style platforming.



Throw Bro OST: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRQFQDIWyZgAts5s26D8oVUJUwyjYFIYQ&si=GVSFVtHaY73_L5Ao

#gamedesign #indiedev #gamedev #retrogaming
